snippet.title: Avalon: The Supreme MMORPG Game on Blockchain | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The best NFT-fueled blockchain P2E game with cutting-edge graphics is officially here. 

Enjoy the incredible footage from our pre-alpha gameplay. 

Purchase your pre-release pass below!

Follow us for the latest updates and NFT drops:
https://linktr.ee/avalonthegame

Now white-listed on Atomic Hub at:
https://wax.atomichub.io/explorer/collection/avalondruids

Available on Open Sea at:
https://opensea.io/collection/avalon-the-game

Avalon is an online multiplayer role-playing game (MPRPG) built on Polygon blockchain. Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players utilize their NFTs to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for cryptocurrency and rare NFT rewards. The game is built around both active play-to-earn and passive own-to-earn economies.

Inspired by the legend of King Arthur and the Island of Avalon, this game challenges every player to undertake a thrilling adventure in their quest to ultimately claim their very own seat among the Knights of The Round Table. Along the way, players earn rewards (i.e. NFTs, $AVL tokens) by purchasing, renting, or securing resources as well as collaborating with NFT landowners to acquire and build in-game real estate.

#blockchain #cryptocommunity #cryptogames #newnftgames #nft #nftcommunity #p2e #p2egames #playtoearn #blockchaingames
